org.apache.ignite.compute.gridify.aop

Class GridifySetToValueAbstractAspect

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.compute.gridify.aop.GridifySetToValueAbstractAspect
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GridifySetToValueAspectJAspect, GridifySetToValueSpringAspect

    public class GridifySetToValueAbstractAspect
extends Object
    Convenience adapter with common methods for different aspect implementations (AspectJ, JBoss AOP, Spring AOP). This adapter used in grid task for GridifySetToValue annotation.

        protected void checkMethodSignature(Method mtd)

      • checkIsSplitToJobsAllowed

        protected void checkIsSplitToJobsAllowed(org.apache.ignite.internal.util.gridify.GridifyRangeArgument arg,
                             GridifySetToValue ann)
                                  throws IgniteCheckedException
        Check if split allowed for input argument. Note, that for argument with unknown elements size with default GridifySetToValue.splitSize() value (default value 0) there is no ability to calculate how much jobs should be used in task execution.
        Parameters:
        arg - Gridify argument.
        ann - Annotation
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If split is not allowed with current parameters.

      • execute

        protected Object execute(Method mtd,
             IgniteCompute compute,
             Class<?> cls,
             org.apache.ignite.internal.util.gridify.GridifyRangeArgument arg,
             GridifyNodeFilter nodeFilter,
             int threshold,
             int splitSize,
             long timeout)
                  throws IgniteCheckedException
        Execute method on grid.
        Parameters:
        mtd - Method.
        compute - IgniteCompute instance.
        cls - Joint point signature class.
        arg - GridifyArgument with all method signature parameters.
        nodeFilter - Node filter.
        threshold - Parameter that defines the minimal value below which the execution will NOT be grid-enabled.
        splitSize - Size of elements to send in job argument.
        timeout - Execution timeout.
        Returns:
        Result.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If execution failed.
